thread.title: Al Reid
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Al Reid

author: Al Reid
title: Al Reid
text: Susan Von Der Lippe is largely responsible to our customer retention success. She is totally focused on the numbers and moving them higher. She knows exactly how to leverage Constant Contact's system to cause repeat business (churn) the customer base. I hope you will recognize her as the Star she is for Constant Contact. Thank you. Al Reid - ACarFor.com
